description: This file defines an interface for a local storage system, including methods for opening a store, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entry counts and entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also defines a shared pointer type for the interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: Interface defining operations for a local data storage system.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a local store at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the store.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries in a table within a range.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table starting at a specified index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries in a specified range from a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a table.
